title: Edu ministry to expand collaboration with Noon Academy
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 29 (APP):Ministry of Federal Education and Professional Training has announced the expansion of partnership with Noon Academy a global Ed-Tech following its remarkable success in enhancing the learning outcomes and exam results of 5000 students.
According to the Education Ministry, building on this excellent performance, we are now scaling up the initiative to benefit 5,000 students of Grade 9 in federal government schools.
“This expanded collaboration aims to further improve educational outcomes and provide high-quality learning opportunities to an increased number of students”, it added.
